question: Which Union Ministry has launched the City Innovation Exchange (CiX) platform?
option2: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs has recently launched the City Innovation Exchange (CiX) platform.
The platform aims to bring together academia, businesses, and the government to design innovative solutions for the challenges of the cities. The platform has over 400 start-ups, 100 smart cities, more than 150 challenge statements and over 215 solutions when it was launched.
